com.centurylink.mdw.util

Class ClasspathUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.util.ClasspathUtil

  • public class ClasspathUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utility methods for validating the CLASSPATH of a runtime environment and determining which version of a class will be loaded.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getCompilerClasspath(java.lang.ClassLoader parentLoader) 
      static java.lang.String getEnvVarClasspath()
      Returns the value of the environment variable CLASSPATH for the runtime environment.
      static java.lang.String getPath()
      Returns the PATH environment variable for the current runtime environment.
      static java.lang.String getRuntimeWorkingDir()
      Returns the present working directory of the runtime environment.
      static java.lang.String getSystemClasspath()
      Returns the system classpath based on the Java runtime property.
      static java.io.File[] listJarFiles(java.io.File directory) 
      static java.io.File[] listJarFiles(java.io.File directory, boolean recursive) 
      static java.lang.String locate(java.lang.String className) 
      static java.lang.String locate(java.lang.String className, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Finds the location of the version of a particular class that will be used by the Java runtime.
      static java.lang.String[] parseSystemClasspath()
      Parses the system classpath, returning a String array of values.

        public static java.lang.String getSystemClasspath()

      • getEnvVarClasspath

        public static java.lang.String getEnvVarClasspath()
        Returns the value of the environment variable CLASSPATH for the runtime environment. Note that the system classpath is used in preference to this if they disagree.
        Returns:
        the classpath from the environment variable

      • getPath

        public static java.lang.String getPath()
        Returns the PATH environment variable for the current runtime environment.
        Returns:
        the PATH environment variable value

      • parseSystemClasspath

        Returns:
        classpath entries

      • parseSystemPath

        public static java.lang.String[] parseSystemPath()

        Returns:

      • locate

        public static java.lang.String locate(java.lang.String className,
                                      java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Finds the location of the version of a particular class that will be used by the Java runtime. Output goes to standard out.
        Parameters:
        className -
        Returns:
        whether the class was located
